title: Large-Scale Usability Testing-Centered Project Learning for Web-Based Writing Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic PC/Smartphone Usage Skills and Writing Proficiency at Secondary Education Level
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with concurrent usability testing to validate a web interface optimized for writing education

learning_goals: Learners can write logical essays of over 1,000 characters using web-based writing tools in mobile environments
Through peer assessment, learners can exchange feedback three or more times and improve the structure of their writing
Learners can derive at least two improvement points for web interfaces by analyzing usability test results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
